about_the_game:
Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Temari, you will acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

Content includes:
• 2 Ninjutsu
- Wind Scythe Jutsu (Ranged Type)
- Summoning: Blade Dance (Ranged Type)

• 1 Secret Technique
- Wind Style: Sea Dragon (Ranged Type)

• 2 Costumes
- Temari Outfit 3
- Temari Outfit Young Ver.

• 1 Avatar Part
- Hair: Temari (BORUTO)

• 1 Weapon
- Temari's Fan

• Additional Content
- Honorary Title: Fifth Kazekage’s Elder Sister

Once you have downloaded this content, you can set a new master by going to Hidden Leaf Village in the online lobby followed by the Ninjutsu Library.

A special training pack for your avatar!

As you train with Temari, you will acquire Training Points that can be used to unlock a wide variety of Ninjutsu and costumes for your avatar!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8350K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.30GHz / AMD FX-6300 Six-Core
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 270X / R7 265 2 GB / Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound device
